overview:
AbilTo started in 2008 with the mission of providing a better option for millions of people seeking to overcome the difficulties resulting from commonplace behavioral disorders and life transitions. Their programs include solutions for those who live with ADD/ADHD, panic/anxiety disorders and more.

Almost universally, itâ€™s hard to find, purchase and benefit from quality care: the result is needless hardship and suffering. So in 2008, AbilTo wanted to do better.

AbilTo is extremely client focused. They make it easy for them by removing common obstacles and making therapy accessible to all by providing programs via web-based videoconferencing.

AbilTo is also results focused. They base all of their manualized programs on empirically validated approaches, Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and coaching, that reliably produce real-world results.

AbilTo is quality obsessed. They train, supervise and integrate the work of all their professionals, as well as strive for continuous quality improvements.

Most importantly, AbilTo does the right thing. They make sure to meet with every prospective client in an initial consultation prior to accepting him/her into any program. If it is deemed that AbilTo’s programs cannot help, they refer the individual to better resources for them.

AbilTo’s approach is effective, private, convenient and cost-effective. It is truly therapy reinvented.
